languages.text: "Уж не знаю, как там сейчас, но недавно в звездную гавань прорвался личный вокс-оператор губернатора. Он оставил нам новые вокс-коды шифрования и убыл по особому поручению, но, по его словам, командный пункт укреплен надежно и пасть не должен".

"I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."
languages.original_text: "Уж не знаю, как там сейчас, но недавно в звездную гавань прорвался личный вокс-оператор губернатора. Он оставил нам новые вокс-коды шифрования и убыл по особому поручению, но, по его словам, командный пункт укреплен надежно и пасть не должен".

traits.locale_text: "I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator made it to the starport recently. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us the command post was well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

"I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator made it to the starport recently. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us the command post was well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

"I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

"I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

"I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

"I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, wie die Lage dort inzwischen aussieht, doch der persönliche Vox-Operateur des Gouverneurs hat sich kürzlich zum Raumhafen durchgeschlagen. Er hat uns die neuen Vox-Codes hinterlassen und ist zu einem Sonderauftrag aufgebrochen. Vorher hat er uns aber noch gesagt, dass die Befehlszentrale gut befestigt ist und keine Gefahr besteht, dass sie fällt."
languages.original_text: "I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, wie die Lage dort inzwischen aussieht, doch der persönliche Vox-Operateur des Gouverneurs hat sich kürzlich zum Raumhafen durchgeschlagen. Er hat uns die neuen Vox-Codes hinterlassen und ist zu einem Sonderauftrag aufgebrochen. Vorher hat er uns aber noch gesagt, dass die Befehlszentrale gut befestigt ist und keine Gefahr besteht, dass sie fällt."

languages.text: « J'ignore quelle est la situation là-bas, mais l'opérateur-vox personnel du gouverneur se trouve depuis peu à l'astroport. Il nous a laissé les nouveaux codes-vox avant de partir en mission spéciale, mais il a eu le temps de nous dire que le poste de commandement tenait bon et qu'il n'était pas près de tomber. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

traits.locale_text: « J'ignore quelle est la situation là-bas, mais l'opérateur-vox personnel du gouverneur se trouve depuis peu à l'astroport. Il nous a laissé les nouveaux codes-vox avant de partir en mission spéciale, mais il a eu le temps de nous dire que le poste de commandement tenait bon et qu'il n'était pas près de tomber. »

languages.text: “我不知道那边目前的情况如何。不过，总督的私人音阵操作员最近抵达了星港，给我们留下了新的音阵密码，之后去执行特殊任务了。临走之前，他告诉我们说指挥所非常稳固，没有倒塌的危险，之后就离开了。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道那边目前的情况如何。不过，总督的私人音阵操作员最近抵达了星港，给我们留下了新的音阵密码，之后去执行特殊任务了。临走之前，他告诉我们说指挥所非常稳固，没有倒塌的危险，之后就离开了。”

languages.text: 「あちら現在の状況は存じ上げませんが、総督直属のヴォクスオペレーターが最近、スターポートに到着しました。彼は我々に新しいヴォクスコードを渡し、特別任務に出発しましたが、司令部は十分に補強されていて、陥落の危険はないと聞きました」
languages.original_text: "I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

traits.locale_text: 「あちら現在の状況は存じ上げませんが、総督直属のヴォクスオペレーターが最近、スターポートに到着しました。彼は我々に新しいヴォクスコードを渡し、特別任務へ出発しましたが、司令部は十分に補強されていて、崩れる危険はないと聞きました」

languages.text: «No sé cómo está la situación allí ahora, pero el operador de voco personal del gobernador llegó hace poco al puerto estelar. Nos dejó los nuevos códigos voco y partió en una misión especial, no sin antes decirnos que el puesto de mando está bien reforzado y no corre peligro».
languages.original_text: "I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

traits.locale_text: «No sé cómo está la situación allí ahora, pero el operador de voco personal del gobernador llegó hace poco al puerto estelar. Nos dejó los nuevos códigos voco y partió en una misión especial, no sin antes decirnos que el puesto de mando está bien reforzado y no corre peligro».

languages.text: "Şu an orada durum nasıldır bilmiyorum ama valinin şahsi voks operatörü kısa süre önce yıldız limanına uğradı. Bize yeni voks kodlarını bıraktı ve özel bir görevle ayrıldı. Gitmeden önce bize komuta noktasının sağlam tahkim edildiğini ve düşürülmesinin imkânsız olduğunu söyledi."
languages.original_text: "I don't know what the situation is like there now, but the governor's personal vox operator recently made it to the starport. He left us the new vox-codes and departed on a special assignment, but not before telling us that the command post is well-reinforced and in no danger of falling."

traits.locale_text: "Şu an orada durum nasıldır bilmiyorum ama valinin şahsi voks operatörü kısa süre önce yıldız limanına uğradı. Bize yeni voks kodlarını bıraktı ve özel bir görevle ayrıldı. Gitmeden önce bize komuta noktasının sağlam tahkim edildiğini ve düşürülmesinin imkânsız olduğunu söyledi."
